misc: Adopted a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter for the 2025 season
biography: Simo, a formidable competitor hailing from Hirsala Golf, is set to make his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. Known for his relentless drive and occasionally colorful language on the course, Simo has become a recognizable figure in the tournament over the years.

With three Hector Trophée victories under his belt, Simo's experience and determination make him a constant threat. Though the coveted Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, his unwavering focus suggests that he is always in contention.

For the 2025 season, Simo has made a notable equipment change, adopting a L.A.B. Golf zero torque putter. This adjustment reflects Simo's continuous pursuit of improvement and willingness to adapt his game.

Those who know Simo know that he can be intimidating on the golf course, but that he is actually a very kind person who is generous with his time and knowledge. His fans will be watching closely to see if he can add another Hector Trophée to his impressive record.
